---
title: Workspace Setup
---

Please use our [project setup guide](https://bristol-training.github.io/data-science-project-setup/) to set up your 
computer for the course. If you have followed this guide, you will also be able to 
install additional packages needed for this course:

```bash
uv add scikit-learn seaborn pandas openpyxl numpy openpyxl
```
